data.text: Mercedes McCambridge, Ruth Roman, Richard Todd. Richard Trevelyan, convicted of murdering his wife, was given an 11th-hour Death Row reprieve and freed after retrial. But his past doesn’t matter to Shelley Carnes, an actress who’s visiting his Texas ranch home. 1951/b&w/91 min/NR/fullscreen.
